msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

TextBase no longer overrides validateBaselinePosition(). It was the only UIComponent to do so. Since the override didn't have the same logic as in UIComponent for the case where the component's actual width or height has not yet been calculated, it caused the baselinePosition of a Spark Label or RichText to be reported as 0 if you access it early.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Enabling doubleClick for Label and RichText.  The way we do this is just set mouseChildren=false for these components, so the underlying TextLines don't get in the way.
Tests run: checkintests, mustella Label, GraphicTags, RichText
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Cleanups from the spark text changes and some bug fixes for VideoElement.  Also some PARB changes for UIComponent.
TitleBar: Changing the skin part type from Label to Textbase
UIComponent: skipMeasure()->canSkipMeasurement() to be in line with GraphicElement.  This has been PARB approved.
UIComponent: same with hasComplexLayoutMatrix...this replaces hasDeltaIdentityTransform.  This has been PARB approved.
StyleProtoChain: cleanup around what interfaces to use
TextBase: clean up code that’s no longer needed.

SDK-22824: sourceLastPlayed keeps track of what video file we’ve called play() with last.  This way if a user pauses the video and wants to start it up again at the same point, we can call play(null) on the underlying FLVPlayback videoPlayer.  However, anytime the souce changes, we want to null out sourceLastPlayed.  This was causing a bug when someone set the source to null and then reset it to it’s previous value.

SDK-23034 (GUMBO_PRIORITY): This deals with some FLVPlayback quirks around sizing.  I had put in a fix so we weren’t setting width/height on the underlying videoPlayer too many times, but apparently we need to make sure it always gets called once.  Hopefully when switching to Strobe we can cleanup this logic...I put a FIXME in to do this.

SDK-21947/ SDK-22533 - some video files don’t always send out a metadata event.  I’m not quite sure why this is, but in case this happens, we do a check in the ready handler to see whether we should call invalidateSize() to make sure it gets sized properly.
Tests run: checkintests, Button, GraphicTags, VideoElement, and VideoPlayer (some VideoPlayer were failing, but I think it should be fine)
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Spark Lable and RichText now render a full transparent bg fill if no backgroundColor is specified. This ensures that the interactive bounds of the element correspond to the layout bounds.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fixing up RichText for use in the FXG compiler case.  This was a fallout from yesterday's checkin moving around spark text components and re-base-classing them.  UIComponents need a parent and a nestLevel for validateXXX() calls to work where as graphic element's don't.
Tests run: checkintests, test case with bug
